description: Notification of a generated jsysmon message. Apart from
the jnxjSysmonTrap objects, this notification can include

event.Summary: ($v5 ne '') ? '$v5' : 'Juniper system monitor message notification generated'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonTrap JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonEventType s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonTimestamp s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonEventName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonResource s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonMessage s EXAMPLE

description: An octet string containing jsysmon event name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonEventType

description: Date and Time of jsysmon message generation.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonTimestamp

description: An octet string containing jsysmon event name.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonEventName

description: An octet string containing jsysmon resource name being monitored.
variables.name: JUNIPER-JSYSMON-MIB::jnxjSysmonResource
